sudoku

Interface SudokuSolver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BacktrackSolver, ConstraintSolver, ExactCoverSolver

    public interface SudokuSolver
    Base class for different sudoku solving strategies.

    • Field Summary

      static int MULTIPLE_SOLUTIONS

      Returns the formity of the board sent.
      boolean isWellFormed(SudokuBoard board)
      Returns true if the board is well formed, that is if the board only has one solution.
      SudokuBoard solve(SudokuBoard board)
      Tries to solve the sudoku board.

    • Method Detail

      • solve

        SudokuBoard solve(SudokuBoard board)
        Tries to solve the sudoku board.
        Parameters:
        board - the board to solve
        Returns:
        a solved version of the board, or null if unsolvable

      • enumerate

        java.util.List<SudokuBoard> enumerate(SudokuBoard board)
        Returns a list of all solutions to the board given.
        Parameters:
        board - the board to solve
        Returns:
        the list of all solutions to the board

      • isWellFormed

        boolean isWellFormed(SudokuBoard board)
        Returns true if the board is well formed, that is if the board only has one solution.
        Parameters:
        board - the board to test
        Returns:
        true if it only has one possible solution

      • getFormity

        int getFormity(SudokuBoard board)
        Returns the formity of the board sent.
        Parameters:
        board - the board to test
        Returns:
        0 if no solutions, 1 if unique solution, -1 if multiple solutions
